name: subscribe-cov-request
description: Represents a BACnet SubscribeCOV request, used to subscribe to change-of-value notifications for a specific object.

fields.name: subscriber-process-identifier
fields.description: The process identifier of the subscriber.

fields.name: monitored-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object to be monitored for changes.

fields.name: issue-confirmed-notifications
fields.description: Indicates if confirmed notifications should be issued. Optional.

fields.name: lifetime
fields.description: The duration of the subscription, in seconds. Optional.
